test_cases.test_name: Installation environment validation for custom EMS/LIMS build
test_cases.objective: Verify that the validated server and network environment is prepared, patched, and configured to host the custom EMS and LIMS applications in accordance with specifications and security policy.

test_steps.action: Review the current operating system, database version, and applied security patches on the target servers.
test_steps.expected_result: Documented versions match the approved configuration baseline.

test_steps.action: Confirm required services (web, DB, message queue) are enabled and set to automatic start.
test_steps.expected_result: All required services are enabled and start without error.

test_steps.action: Execute installation script with digital signature verification enabled.
test_steps.expected_result: Script executes successfully and hash signature matches release record.

acceptance_criteria: All versions and patches match baseline.
Installation script completes without error and hash verified.

test_cases.test_name: Verify dependency libraries and drivers installation integrity
test_cases.objective: Confirm that all third-party libraries, device drivers, and middleware components required by the custom application are installed, at the correct versions, and checksum-verified.

test_steps.action: Compare installed library versions against Bill of Materials.
test_steps.expected_result: Every library version matches BOM entries.

test_steps.action: Run checksum utility to verify driver packages.

acceptance_criteria: 100 % of libraries and drivers match required versions.

test_cases.test_name: Code deployment integrity and audit trail activation check
test_cases.objective: Ensure deployment of compiled code to production repository is recorded in the audit trail and that rollback points are automatically created.

test_steps.action: Deploy latest build using automated pipeline with audit trail enabled option.
test_steps.expected_result: Deployment completes and generates an audit trail entry with user ID.

test_steps.action: Verify rollback snapshot is created and listed in repository metadata.

acceptance_criteria: Audit trail entry contains user, date, time, action and checksum.
Rollback snapshot exists and is protected.

test_cases.test_name: Continuous temperature monitoring function verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that the EMS custom module records temperature readings continuously at ≤5-minute intervals across all defined storage zones.

test_steps.action: Start monitoring service and allow system to record data for 30 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Minimum six readings captured per probe.

test_steps.action: Query database for time stamp interval between successive readings.

test_cases.test_name: Temperature alert generation at deviation thresholds
test_cases.objective: Demonstrate that the EMS generates real-time alerts when temperature deviates by ±2 °C from setpoint and routes notifications to designated users.

test_steps.action: Introduce controlled heat to raise probe temperature 3 °C above setpoint.
Lower temperature 3 °C below setpoint.
Verify email/SMS notification receipt and content.
test_steps.expected_result: Notification contains location, value, time stamp.

acceptance_criteria: Alerts generated for both high and low excursions.

test_cases.test_name: Temperature range and accuracy verification across probes
test_cases.objective: Confirm the EMS records temperatures accurately between −80 °C and +50 °C with ±0.5 °C accuracy using calibrated references.

test_steps.action: Place probe in −20 °C chamber and record EMS value and reference value.
Repeat at +40 °C chamber.

test_cases.test_name: LIMS sample registration workflow execution test
test_cases.objective: Validate that users can register samples with all required attributes and system generates unique sample IDs as per configured workflow.

test_steps.action: Log in as Analyst and enter sample data including batch number, manufacture date, storage condition.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample accepted and unique ID generated.

test_steps.action: Verify data saved in database tables.

test_cases.test_name: Out-of-Specification (OOS) business rule execution verification
test_cases.objective: Verify custom scripted business rule automatically flags OOS results, creates investigation record, and routes to QA.

test_steps.action: Enter analytical result exceeding upper limit.
test_steps.expected_result: System flags result as OOS and creates investigation task.

test_steps.action: Check task assignment in QA review queue.

test_cases.test_name: Expiry date automatic calculation logic verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS correctly calculates expiry dates based on product master data and manufacturing date during sample login.

test_steps.action: Enter manufacturing date and product code with 24-month shelf life.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates expiry date exactly 24 months later.

test_steps.action: Save sample and review stored expiry field.

acceptance_criteria: Calculated expiry date correct to day.

test_cases.test_name: Stability study protocol execution in LIMS
test_cases.objective: Validate creation, scheduling, and sample pull actions for stability studies configured via vendor tools.

test_steps.action: Create new stability study with defined pull points.
Trigger next pull and verify sample list auto-generated.

acceptance_criteria: Study schedules and pull lists correct.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic worksheets execution for analytical methods
test_cases.objective: Confirm all 15 configured electronic worksheets load, calculate results, and save without error.

test_steps.action: Open each worksheet template sequentially.
Enter sample data and auto-calculate result.

acceptance_criteria: Worksheets open and calculate correctly for all methods.

test_cases.test_name: Two-stage electronic review and approval workflow test
test_cases.objective: Verify that analytical results require Analyst entry, Reviewer check, and QA approval before release and that status changes lock records.

test_steps.action: As Analyst, submit results for review.
As Reviewer, approve results.
As QA, final approve.

acceptance_criteria: Status transitions occur in correct order and records lock after QA approval.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic signature enforcement and authentication strength
test_cases.objective: Confirm electronic signatures require unique username/password plus meaning of signature and are stored with time stamp and hash.

test_steps.action: Attempt to sign with incorrect credentials.
Sign with correct credentials and reason.

acceptance_criteria: Valid signature captured with user, date/time, meaning.

test_cases.test_name: Boundary condition test for temperature sensor limits
test_cases.objective: Verify system correctly handles boundary readings exactly at −80 °C and +50 °C without error or rounding.

test_steps.action: Expose probe to −80 °C and record reading.
Expose probe to +50 °C and record reading.

acceptance_criteria: Readings within accuracy and no errors logged.

test_cases.test_name: Invalid sample attribute handling negative test
test_cases.objective: Ensure LIMS rejects samples with missing mandatory fields or out-of-range attribute lengths and logs validation error.

test_steps.action: Attempt to save sample without batch number.
Enter 11-char batch number exceeding limit.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents save and records validation error.

acceptance_criteria: System prevents invalid data entry and records error.

test_cases.test_name: Audit trail record completeness verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that all create, modify, and delete events for EMS and LIMS records are captured with user, timestamp, old value, new value, and reason fields.

test_steps.action: Modify a sample record and then delete it.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail captures both events with full details.

test_steps.action: Generate audit trail report and review entries.
test_steps.expected_result: All mandatory fields populated and uneditable.

acceptance_criteria: 100 % of events recorded with complete metadata.

test_cases.test_name: Data retention and archival verification for seven-year period
test_cases.objective: Confirm that EMS data older than retention threshold is archived using vendor utility and remains retrievable and readable.

test_steps.action: Execute archival job on sample data ≥7 years old.
test_steps.expected_result: Job completes without error and files relocated to archive.

test_steps.action: Retrieve archived record and display.

test_cases.test_name: Timestamp accuracy and time-zone consistency verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure that all system-generated timestamps are in UTC and synchronized across application, database, and OS layers.

test_steps.action: Compare OS, DB, and application time values.
Create record and verify stored timestamp format.

test_cases.test_name: Secure data export checksum and integrity test
test_cases.objective: Verify that data exported from LIMS to external files is encrypted, checksum-validated, and that checksum matches on import.

test_steps.action: Export sample data set and record generated checksum.
Import file into test system and validate checksum.

test_cases.test_name: System throughput under peak concurrent user load
test_cases.objective: Determine system performance when 100 concurrent users execute high-frequency transactions for 30 minutes.

test_steps.action: Simulate 100 users performing sample login and result entry.
Monitor CPU and memory utilization.

acceptance_criteria: Response time and resource use within limits.

test_cases.test_name: Database transaction stress test for 10,000 inserts
test_cases.objective: Validate that the database can handle 10,000 transaction inserts in <15 minutes without deadlocks or rollback failures.

test_steps.action: Run batch script to insert 10,000 sample records.
Check DB logs for deadlocks.

acceptance_criteria: Insert time and log review meet criteria.

test_cases.test_name: Temperature write response time under polling load
test_cases.objective: Measure EMS response time for writing temperature readings while polling 200 sensors simultaneously.

test_steps.action: Initiate polling cycle for 200 virtual sensors.
Review application performance logs.

test_cases.test_name: LIMS report generation performance and accuracy test
test_cases.objective: Validate that standard and custom reports generate within 60 seconds and reflect accurate real-time data using the reporting engine.

test_steps.action: Generate batch COA report and measure time.
Cross-check report values with database queries.

test_cases.test_name: Role-based access control penetration test
test_cases.objective: Attempt to escalate privileges from Analyst to QA Approver role through common attack vectors to ensure RBAC enforcement.

test_steps.action: Use SQL injection attempt on login form.
Attempt direct URL access to QA functions.
test_steps.expected_result: System redirects to error page and logs event.

test_cases.test_name: Password policy enforcement and lockout verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure password complexity, expiry, history, and lockout rules meet SOP SEC-004 requirements.

test_steps.action: Attempt to set weak password '1234'.
Enter wrong password five times.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic signature non-repudiation cryptographic test
test_cases.objective: Validate that electronic signatures are cryptographically bound to records and cannot be transferred to another record.

test_steps.action: Export signed record and attempt to edit signature XML.
test_steps.expected_result: System detects tampering and invalidates record.

test_steps.action: Attempt to copy signature blob to new record.

test_cases.test_name: Network port vulnerability scan for EMS and LIMS servers
test_cases.objective: Run vulnerability scanner to ensure only approved ports are open and no critical CVEs remain unpatched.

test_steps.action: Perform full TCP/UDP scan on production subnet.
Review vulnerability report for critical findings.
test_steps.expected_result: No critical or high findings remain open.

test_cases.test_name: EMS-LIMS-SAP integration data flow verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm data generated in LIMS is transferred to SAP via standard adapter and that acknowledgments are correctly processed.

test_steps.action: Release test batch in LIMS and trigger interface.
Verify SAP receives and posts data.

test_cases.test_name: Alarm notification integration with email and SMS gateways
test_cases.objective: Verify temperature alarms generate notifications through both email and SMS gateways with correct content and escalation.

test_steps.action: Trigger high-temperature alarm.
test_steps.expected_result: Email and SMS sent to first-level contacts.

test_steps.action: Acknowledge alarm within 10 minutes.

test_cases.test_name: ERP batch release data exchange and reconciliation
test_cases.objective: Ensure batch release status in SAP updates EMS temperature release flag and that reconciliation report shows zero mismatches.

test_steps.action: Change batch status to 'Released' in SAP.
Run reconciliation report.
